name: Mammut 8mm Nylon Static Cord
description:
This 8mm cord can be used for cordalletes, tag lines, prusiks, and non-climbing function you can think of.Static strength is 1733kg.Sold by the metre.

        Sustainability






.bluesign-cls-1,.bluesign-cls-2,.bluesign-cls-3{fill:none;}.bluesign-cls-2,.bluesign-cls-3{stroke:#333;stroke-width:1.79px;}.bluesign-cls-2{stroke-linejoin:round;}.bluesign-cls-3{stroke-miterlimit:10;}
